headline: A federal judge in Washington, D.C., temporarily blocked the Trump administration from deporting a wider group of people without a court hearing, a blow to one of the key parts of President Trump’s deportation campaign
Israel begins heavy airstrikes ahead of Gaza City onslaught, warns Hamas fighters abroad that attacks ‘will reach them, too’
Fed governor Lisa Cook sued President Trump, seeking to block his move to fire her, in an unprecedented legal battle testing the president’s power over the independent central bank’s board
New video appears to show New Zealand fugitive dad with his child
Russia launches sweeping attack on Southern Ukraine — two days after deadly barrage on Kyiv
Houthis confirm their prime minister killed in Israeli strike
Xi shows Trump who holds the cards as he sets up meeting with Kim and Putin
Newsom, California lawmakers strike deal that would allow Uber, Lyft drivers to unionize
Watch: Putin, Modi and other world leaders in China for summit
Bullet fragment found in neck of Minneapolis Catholic school shooting survivor who was shielded by his friend
